front.title: Snapshot of E.164 Work - An Unofficial View

abstract.t: This is an unofficial snapshot of some E.164 work. It includes some information on E.164-series ITU-T Recommendations, 'country code' assignments, and future pending decisions, meetings, and work. E.164 is an ITU-T Recommendation on international numbering for public telecommunication. All views expressed in this Internet Draft are unofficial and are not intended to represent those of any organization, corporation, or Administration. This Internet-Draft is an independent submission to the Telephone Number Mapping (enum) working group. Comments should be sent to the author.
